title: Activate FitFlow
description: Follow these simple steps to activate your FitFlow application

step1.title: Visit Activation Portal
step1.description: Go to the FitFlow activation portal to get your license key

step2.title: Copy Your License Key
step2.description: Log in and copy your license key from the portal as shown below
step2.imageAlt: Screenshot showing where to copy the license key

step3.title: Activate Your App
step3.description: Paste your license key below to activate FitFlow
